articles.content:

articles.title: Medical students at Harvard fight COVID-19 fake news, one tweet at a time - Study International
articles.description: Harvard students in medical and public health programmes are using their education to fight fake news and provide accurate information about COVID-19.
articles.content:
These days, we are just a Google search away from graphs, charts, graphics, bulleted lists, and diagrams detailing the COVID-19 pandemic and how to combat it.
But Evan Stieler, a dual dual-degree MD/MBA at Harvard University had a better idea.
To spread the… [+7379 chars]
